reviews.text:
Wonderful staff, service and rooms. Stayed here with Intrepid Travel tour group while visiting the Golden Temple and everyone enjoyed their stay. 
 There is a rooftop bar and sitting area perfect for a drink and snack. The dinner and breakfast buffet were excellent and there was something for everyone. The desserts were especially delicious. We loved the way the scent of the lillys filled the lobby. We would stay here again.
I enjoyed my stay here with family. Beautiful and clean rooms. Had lovely, Delicious and tasty food at the breakfast table. All the staff and service was great. Will recommend this hotel to everyone.
The stay was brilliant. Very neat and good bathroom facilities. Awesome food and services. The staffs were also very cooperative. Over all brilliant place to stay.

We visited "Flavours" restaurant in Sarovar Portico. Food was totally rubbish- stale and pathetic! Forget about variety or service or ambience. These parameters don't even matter when quality of food (right from the soups & starters to main course and deserts) is way below standard. Will not recommend to anyone...
Awesome ambience..... Well organized and very polite staff...... Good service......located in peaceful and beautiful area

Very nice place to stay. The rooms are very spacious to sleep for 5-6 persons. Very neat and clean. Also it is very near to golden temple. It is one of the oldest place to stay. The staff is also very helpful. Rooms have balcony too which opens towards street. But they should focus on the room allotment.

Very old and decent sarai for pilgrims. Only thing which need improvement is the room booking process. It is not included in SGPC online booking system. I request SGPC to include this also fo online booking
Very very good facility. Thanks to God gave us the room in guru Arjan Dev Ji niwas

Just wonderful, clean rooms, very much affordable.... 700/ night 800 deposit. 

You will get room only if.. 
1)You are checking in with your family
2) if you intend to stay less then 3 days

Pro tip: if want a room check in before 12 afternoon and always check-in with your family members also avoid weekends.
Awesome place, extremely clean to get freshen up and relax.

The staff is also very helpful. Rooms have balcony too which opens towards street. But they should focus on the room allotment.

It's not a lodge, the building converted into SGPC office..
Awesomeness
Osm

The temple is quite big and somewhat resembles the shrine of golden temple but the maintainance is quite necessary for this temple as this is very famous temple in the city. It needs to be clean and pure but there is nothing like that. Now the construction is going on these days let's see how they maintain as government has given that amount for the maintenance of the temple.

Good place. Religious place where you see old temple. Peaceful place but at this time it is under construction due to this here you feel some difficulty but it's  a  good place. Here is also a sweet shop where you can buy all Amritsar special taste fresh sweets. Good you have to see

It is a Hindu temple designed in the centre of a lake/ sarowar just like in Golden temple. It's design is as well similar to the Golden Temple. Quite popular to people. There are some food joints on its approach lane those serve good quality foods at quite economical rates.
Nice Mandir when I visited some construction work was going on. I'm sure it will be looking fantastic once completed.

One of the Famous and oldest Temple of Amritsar City. Hindu and Sikh devotees come here with Family and children.
Foreigners travelers loves to come here to get Blessings. On Special Occasion peoples came here from rest of the world. जी श्री कृष्णा 🙏 जै श्री राम।।

I think we all have a beautiful place in our mind. I have a wonderful place that made me happy a lot of times, years ago. But sometimes I think that I am the only person who likes this place and I'm asking myself if this place will be as beautiful as I thought when I will go back to visit it again. Perhaps I made it beautiful in my mind
Historical place sahib shri guru hargobind singh g most beautiful place
Best place
Historical place for Sikhs
Speechless

If the stars are required to be given for the effort of the government to preserve the struggle against the suppression and oppression of foreign powers, they have done a great job and the public also is equally matching in vigour to keep the most disturbing attribute of alien powers.

The monument plays the required vital role of keeping the flame of patriotism alive and it is poignant to note that the Wagah border trip , another sign of passionate uproarious patriotism, is canvassed and pick up is done from here.

It is a public garden in Amritsar and houses a national importance, established in 1951 by Government of INDIA, to commemorate massacre of peaceful celebrators including unarmed women and children by British occupying forces.
A historical place, situated adjacent to The Golden Temple, Inside the monument, there is a Martyrs well wherein the soldiers jumped in to not get defeated by the rulers and sacrificed their lives for the country.

The place is not well maintained, but because of sheer historical importance, a visit is warranted. Indian policemen fired in Indian people in orders of a British commissioner, and killed 1000+ people. This shows why the British could rule us for 200 years- we simply don't have a sense of camaraderie within ourselves. The place will close post 6pm, and is very near to golden temple. DO HIT THE LIKE BUTTON IF THIS WAS HELPFUL.

One of the major sites of the Indian struggle for Independence, the Jallianwala Bagh is a monument of National importance. It was here that the British officials opened fire on a rather peaceful Indian crowd including women and children. The garden is spread across an area of 6.5 acres and still contains several bullet marks left by the British.

Best place to bring your children.You can go to picnic or enjoy some personal time in peace here. It is a public garden in Amritsar and houses a national importance, established in 1951 by Government of INDIA, to commemorate massacre of peaceful celebrators including unarmed women and children by British occupying forces on the occasion of Punjabi new year.

If the stars are required to be given for the effort of the government to preserve the struggle against the suppression and oppression of foreign powers, they have done a great job and the public also is equally matching in vigour to keep the most disturbing attribute of alien powers.

The monument plays the required vital role of keeping the flame of patriotism alive and it is poignant to note that the Wagah border trip , another sign of passionate uproarious patriotism, is canvassed and pick up is done from here.

This shows why the British could rule us for 200 years- we simply don't have a sense of camaraderie within ourselves. The place will close post 6pm, and is very near to golden temple. DO HIT THE LIKE BUTTON IF THIS WAS HELPFUL.

It was here that the British officials opened fire on a rather peaceful Indian crowd including women and children. The garden is spread across an area of 6.5 acres and still contains several bullet marks left by the British.

Everybody tells about this place that this place is a very calm Palace but I think this place tell the history of the Great His Highness Maharaja Ranjit Singh Ji's  Bravery.
 The man who quoted the अमृतसर temple from gold . 
This is statues tell the story of the great person who fight for the nation not for himself great respect.

Maharaja Ranjit Singh was the leader of the Sikh Empire, which ruled the northwest Indian subcontinent in the early half of the 19th century. The statue shows Maharaja Ranjit Singh saddled on his horse proudly looking towards the horizon. The statue is a symbol of the Sikh power during the 18th century.

Maharaja Ranjit Singh’s glorious statue adorns the lush green Rambagh Garden. The statue shows Maharaja Ranjit Singh saddled on his horse proudly looking towards the horizon. The statue is a symbol of the Sikh power during the 18th century. People capture their pics with the statue of Maharaja Ranking Singh for their reminisce.
A Big statue of Lion of Punjab Maharaja Ranjit Singh located in corridor towards Sri Darbar Sahib(Golden temple).

Closed for public..only Sarkari parahune can visit :(
Great
Good
Private property

Nature's heaven to watch natural beauty and wonderful birds specially migratory birds. Natural habitat for small insects who lives close to water body..Clean air, peaceful environment and calm surrounding.. nice place for family visits or picnic..very close to Jalandhar , Amritsar and surrounding location..Never miss to carry your camera, hat and glasses with drinking water

hari ke is a barrage in punjab near taran taran district where satluj and beas river joins and a small dam is made on both river to controle tje flow of water from this barrage some water goes to pakistan in emergency when there is a lot of water in barrage and indira gandhi canal also starts from this points this canal feeds water for irrigation to many districts of rajasthan this canal is the life line of rajasthan a beautiful and scary for them has a phobia of water there is also a gurudwara sahib namely ishardham baba ishar singh ji very beautiful gurudwara with lot of greenery wide range of flowers and and a variety of birds and sparrows must visit this place such a great nature .....
Rajasthan  received water from harike
Location is not correct. This is not Harike Bird Sanctuary or Harike Wetlands. Harike Wetlands/ Bird Sanctuary is 33 kms away.
Nice place.

They serve delicious food and it's difficult to forget the taste. The place is near and clean near market and at a short distance from Golden Temple. The staff too is good but the service may take a bit longer. Overall it's a good place to enjoy food.

This was the most hyped place that I used to go with my family as a kid. Since coming back to India after 10 years I really wanted to re-visit this place. Maybe India has so many other restaurants now that I had already visited before coming to this place. I didn't quite like the quality and cleanliness of this palace. I don't think this is the same place it was 10 years ago. However, service was very quick and efficient.

This is a lovely place to have food.  Lively environment and great staff and food is so delicious.  Its not very expensive.  I will rate this as a budget dining place where you can enjoy special occasions with your family. This place serves great sweets which are always fresh and high quality.  They also provide home delivery
Very good place to eat. Price is high but according to service and taste it's worth it. Super clean and beautiful place just near to market

Good food and I feel it's only famous because of its location.. the place didn't live up to it's hype for us and we certainly expected more.. the for rates like any other restaurant around. We went during dinner time and the waiter allotted to our table was damn slow, unresponsive and forgetful.. we had to tell him every instructions at least twice.. the service can improve and the food can have some more innovation to live up to the hype..

Visited this evening and what an amazing feast. Tried the butter chicken, tandoori chicken and another chicken dish and all were the best i have ever had. 

The restaurant was very clean and tidy and the service was excellent. The owner was very atentive making sure we had what we wanted.

A real winner

Food was too amazing and delicious. Simply loved the food and overall experience . Specially the way his owner greet each and every individual guest and suggest there special dishes as per the taste of there customers. Highly recommended without any second thought!!

This was my second visit here on 17 march 2019 and nothing much has changed. The food remains as delicious as ever, the staff ever so polite. A must must must place to visit for "Charming" food if you happen to visit Amritsar. It is my word you wont be disappointed if you love chicken.
Food was very delicious. Hospitality by owner and his staff. Will be happy to visit again. Best experience till now
Best Butter chicken you will ever have. We had great experience at Charming Chicken i went with my friends. Restaurant was so hygiene. Service was fast. Must eat Butter chicken.
Great place to hang out. Prices are normal, not much, but good to go. Food quality is also great. Famous fish with a pitcher of beer would make your day better.
Not at all like everyone recommends it. The items are not anything you will not get somewhere else. Even the taste and quality is not as described in most of the reviews

The place serves some really delicious food. Both Vegetarian and Non Vegetarian options. It’s great value for money. The food is tasty. The service is really quick. The staff is very helpful and suggest the specials. You must have this restaurant on your list of restaurants when you visit Amritsar. We had the standard Butter chicken and Mutton Roghanjosh  and were not disappointed. The food was just very well made and super tasty. It was fresh and the meat was tender.

The place has a good ambience. However the service is like a basic diner. The Fish you get is good, however the butter chicken was not satisfactory. Another surprise was they dont accept cards. But you should fancy if you are in Amritsar
Superb food - both veg and non-veg! A must do place for trying out genuine and tasty Amritsari food! They also have hard drinks on their menu.
Very nice people and very good food
Amazing experience, very tasty, service professional, good drink's and coffee

"Small & Sweet" fits it best. 
Eating joint, Inside the campus of Golden temple,
They serve it fresh and hot with a tender smile.

We visited the place during our visit to Golden temple from Ahmedabad.

Keep doing the good work.
Lots of comfortable seated located right near the golden temple. Big menu with Indian and Chinese food and a big milkshake selection. Staff also speaks English which was really helpful.
Good food good taste. Love to come again. Open till late night.

One of the best Pizza Huts in the area. First folks in so the buffet wasn’t completely out yet. Though the food that was, was absolutely delicious & hot. Staff was friendly & on top of things. Restaurant was pretty clean & well organized.
SO so ummy...and I love supporting young readers -- thanks, Hut! ...did I mention how very yummy the pizza was? Seriously. Good pizza 🥰
Love their pizza! It's the best anywhere. The service at this one is amazing, too!
Food was good and so was the service. Waitress was great also!
Pizza hut has been always the best pizza and love the salads and sauces. Great services as well.
